name: BOK-BOK: A Chicken Dating Sim
description:
Have you ever pondered what the romantic life of a chicken is like? Take the role of Henry Cock as you try and woo as many hens as you can! With a unique, never-before-seen puzzle concept, you'll soon lose track of time as you become the best chicken dater in the world!

Choose between three dates, each with a unique personality and twist on the puzzle. Can you successfully woo all three of the lovely hens?
